EmailTemplate.name: Welcome Nurture 2018.2 - Director/C-Level - Welcome
EmailTemplate.subject: Did you know? We have lots of complimentary assets just for you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings from Pivotal!
We wanted to send you a quick note to make sure that you’re aware of all the free materials we have on our site <[[https://content.pivotal.io/resources?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-2&utm_campaign=nurture-executive-2018]]>. From eBooks <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-2&utm_campaign=nurture-executive-2018]]> about digital transformation, and cloud-native journeys, to Gartner and Forrester analyst reports <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-2&utm_campaign=nurture-executive-2018]]> highlighting the latest trends and technologies - we have you covered
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
© 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. <[[http://info.pivotal.io/ZUA000ARC0000000V20NJI0]]> Unsubscribe <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiWmpkak16QTFOVGhpTmpNeSIsInQiOiJWT004WEh6MEVjajlvZG1zQlRiOXlKbkNvVDdEckZjMGZXQTh1OEhwdlpKNUVKbFhmd29SbTFEcVZGQWpzTzA1XC9reTE3MzJcLzZuWGl2bUpoXC83dncwdz09In0%253D?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-2&utm_campaign=nurture-executive-2018]]>.
